name: Tweaks - Set Default Start Menu Layout
description: This will set a clean Start Menu, or allow you to supply a content item which contains a Start2.bin and settings.dat files that you'd like to use as the Windows 11 Start Menu Layout

options.name: content
options.description: This has the Step Definition Content

options.name: scriptName
options.description: This is the Script that does the Stuff

options.name: BRANDINGStartLayoutCI
options.displayName: Custom Start Menu Layout  Content Item:
options.description: Must contain both the start2.bin file and the settings.dat file.
